formatted_address: 40 Pasir Panjang Road, Mapletree Business City, #02-38, Singapore 117440
name: Hitoyoshi Ramen & Grill – Mapletree Business City

reviews.text: Decent ramen restaurant at Mapletree Business Centre, comes with free flow bean sprout, corn and table water!

Delicious ramen.

$52.52 for 2 bowls, 1 lotus root ball, and 1 green tea

Was here for after-work drinks, and it's honestly quite alright. The place itself is not fancy, but it works. Guinness draft running at 3 for 33 SGD, is a pretty fair value afterall. Lady serving us was nice and prompt. That said, there was also no one else in the restaurant given the holiday period that we visited, so I'm not too sure what happens when they're crowded.

Didn't try the food so I cannot comment, but it seems to me like any other food ramen spot as well.

This restaurant and bar is located amidst all the other food options, in the middle of Mapletree Business City. Landmarks include being right by Starbucks on the one side, and Subway on the other; if you see Paik Coffee, you're near enough.
Not too bad. There’s bean sprout which you can take it.

Located along the elevated walkway , place is ok if you want a quite place to hang out.
One can order few types of japanese food, draft beer and wine.
Staff is courteous.

vicinity: 40 Pasir Panjang Road, Mapletree Business City, #02-38
